detail_desc: Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a fine, textured knit with a round neckline, tapered waist with an inset band and a flared, pleated skirt.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Sleeveless top in chiffon with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and plastic bead fringes. Satin lining.
Bracelets in various designs with plastic beads and pendants. Four metal chain bracelets with adjustable fasteners and one fabric thread bracelet in an adjustable length.
Knee-length shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants. Length 5 cm.
Sleeveless top in a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back with a broderie anglaise flounce.

Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with raised details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops. Soft terry inside the feet.
Draped blouse in satin with a sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted jumper in an airy rib-knit with pointelle-knit sections, a stand-up collar with an overlocked edge and long sleeves.

prod_name: Beverly HW Loose Mom Fit Dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Gloves in leather with a soft, knitted lining.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated seam and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Lace shortie briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and flared hem. Lined at the top.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short dress in jersey with short sleeves. a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a print motif and appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Quilted lining.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with checked trims on the shoulders that continue down the sleeves, contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves, flared cuffs with a pleat, and a straight-cut hem.

Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Ventilating mesh at the crotch, and zipped side pockets. Jersey inner shorts.
Fitted shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour trim. High waist with covered elastication and rounded hems.
Body in jersey with a sheen. Sewn-in wrapover upper section with a concealed press-stud and short cap sleeves. Lower section in soft microfibre with laser-cut edges and press-studs at the crotch.
Short cycling shorts in stretch jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes and an elasticated hem. Medium support.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck, a yoke at the front and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey joggers in a soft viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and straight legs with short slits in the hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a gently flared, rounded hem.
Velour scrunchie with a bow
All-in-one suit in soft velour made from an organic cotton blend. Press-studs down the front and along the legs, long sleeves with frill trims over the shoulders, and full feet.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. Patterned T-shirt with a print motif. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Paper straw hat with a band.
Short T-shirt dress in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and a yoke with cut-out sections over the shoulders. Raw-edged hem, slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather cap with a cotton lining.
Glittery pompoms with a plastic handle Length approx. 35 cm.
Metal hoop earrings covered in plastic beads.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, glittery sections, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in imitation leather with a high waist, pleats at the top, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, decorative welt back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a fringe-trimmed wrapover front and fringed hem. Inner skirt.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, visible button fly, front and back pockets and skinny legs.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with an intarsia motif and appliqués with plastic beads and pompoms on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a concealed zip in one side, fake front and back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Short, fitted dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, peak lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with metal D-rings. Lined.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Patterned triangle bikini top with contrasting colour trims and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Tie-top shoulder straps and ties at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Calf-length satin skirt with a high waist, wrapover front and concealed zip at the back. Slits at both sides and at the back. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a print motif on the front and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in velour with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Set with metal ear cuffs and earrings, six decorated with glass rhinestones. Three ear cuffs and eight earrings that can be worn together or separately. The zinc content of the ear cuffs and earrings is recycled.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Shirt in washed stretch denim made from an organic cotton blend with press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Lined cotton chinos with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with an elastic gore in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with laser-cut edges and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Shirt in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length, A-line beach dress in an airy, patterned weave with a deep V-neck with gold-coloured studs, and long dolman sleeves with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the cuffs. Unlined.
